javadoc:
A utility class that creates tool tip text for given data types.
@since Tracker Id 616

methods.name: getToolTipText
methods.comment:
Examines the give dataType and creates a tool tip for it, 
 depending upon its actual class type.

params.name: dataType
params.comment:
The data type from which a tool tip will be 
         created.

return.comment: tool tip text for the given data type.

methods.name: getHTMLRepresentation
getToolTipText
methods.comment: Return an HTML formatted rendering of an external location/function.

params.name: includeSymbolDetails
params.comment: true to include details of the symbol

return.comment: tool tip text for the given external location/function

methods.name: getToolTipText
methods.comment: Return an HTML formatted rendering of a function

params.name: includeSymbolDetails
params.comment: true to include details of the symbol

return.comment: tool tip text for the given function

name: ToolTipUtils
comment: A utility class that creates tool tip text for given data types.
